page.title: 07AGRICULTURAL FARMING
page.content: The college owns {225 milking cows, {110 dairy youngstock, 41 bulls and {steers}under one year,{20 heifers } under one year,{100 sows }and offspring to pork, {300 ewes }and {459 {lambs,7 rams.}The college farm owns {7 {tractors }and {1 combine harvester. } The college machinery department owns{ {26 tractors.}The are{11 outbuildings} mainly used for storage or housing livestock.The college has{3 natural {ponds}and{4 streams.}There is room for {10,000 poultry }on the site.Trees are grown on the site as well as crops.On the site of the college are{4 badger {sets.}
